The Intuitive Power of Savoir-Relier </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESSDISCOURSENET;5549fa8b.1502</link>   <description> Dear BUSINESSDISCOURSENET Subscribers,<br><br>We hope the following titles will be of interest to you.<br><br>[Leading with Sense]&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/leading-with-sense&gt;Leading with Sense&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/leading-with-sense&gt;<br><br>The Intuitive Power of Savoir-Relier<br>Val\ufffd\ufffdrie Gauthier<br>&quot;When managing complex teams in chaotic environments, Val\ufffd\ufffdrie Gauthier advocates a leadership style she calls savoir-relier, defined as relational intelligence ... Gauthier details how she employed savoir-relier techniques to lead a turnaround of a troubled MBA program at HEC Paris. The result is a warm, practical, and thoughtful book.&quot;-BizEd<br>"Val\ufffd\ufffdrie Gauthier offers an original, engaging, important, and useful perspective on effective leadership for dynamic times. The book shows how top managers are driving organizational [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T13:06:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rachel Shand</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESSDISCOURSENET;5549fa8b.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESSDISCOURSENET;f9dda7e8.1501">   <title>The Co-Creation Paradigm </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESSDISCOURSENET;f9dda7e8.1501</link>   <description> Dear BUSINESSDISCOURSENET subscribers,<br><br>We hope these titles are of interest.<br><br>[The Co-Creation Paradigm]&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/the-co-creation-paradigm&gt;The Co-Creation Paradigm&lt;http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/the-co-creation-paradigm&gt;<br>Venkat Ramaswamy &amp; Kerimcan Ozcan<br>&quot;Creating and maintaining a competitive advantage is a race towards an ever moving target. Co-creation is the latest lever to get ahead by involving business partners, directly drawing upon their skills and efforts. Doing this requires a new business paradigm, which is well captured in Ramaswamy and Ozcan's practical and inspiring book.&quot;-Hans L\ufffd\ufffdss\ufffd\ufffde, Senior Director, Strategic Risk Management, The LEGO Group<br>"As a sequel to The Future of Competition and The Power of Co-Creation, Venkat Ramaswamy and co-author Kerimcan Ozcan [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-26T12:29:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rachel Shand</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESSDISCOURSENET;f9dda7e8.1501</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
